SUBTITLE_CONNECT: Instantly connect with the best independent coiffeurs and mobile stylists in your city. View portfolios, read reviews, and book your next style effortlessly.
TALENT_SHOWCASE_TEXT: We provide independent coiffeurs a professional platform to display their full portfolio, services, and real client reviews to build a trusted online presence.
BOOKING_SYSTEM_TEXT: Clients can instantly check availability, request services, and manage appointments without endless calls or messaging, making booking effortless.
MOBILE_STYLIST_NETWORK_TEXT: Access the 'Déplacé' network: submit a service request for your location and receive custom price proposals from mobile stylists in an innovative, flexible model.
CLASSIC_APPOINTMENTS_TEXT: Book traditional services (cuts, color, styling) directly with local salons and independent stylists. Check their real-time capacity and join the queue for a quick visit or reserve a slot in advance.
DIGITAL_PORTFOLIO_TEXT: Every coiffeur features a complete profile with high-quality photos, service menus, pricing, and client reviews, ensuring you make an informed choice every time.
PRICE_BIDDING_TEXT: Describe your desired mobile service. Mobile stylists ('Déplacé') respond with competitive price proposals. You choose the best offer and confirm the booking instantly.
LOGIN_TO_VIEW: Log in or sign up to view the full portfolio, services, and contact details.
ALL_RIGHTS_RESERVED: All rights reserved. | Luxury Hair Service Marketplace
CLIENT_1_TEXT: Browse local coiffeurs by city, category (Homme, Femme, Déplacé), or proximity.
CLIENT_2_TEXT: View their photo gallery, full service menu, and client reviews to pick your favorite.
CLIENT_3_TEXT: Reserve a time slot, or for mobile stylists, submit a price request and wait for proposals.
CLIENT_4_TEXT: Receive confirmation, chat directly (if needed), and enjoy your new look!
HAIRDRESSER_1_TEXT: Set up your profile, address, and category (Homme, Femme, Déplacé).
HAIRDRESSER_2_TEXT: Add your detailed service menu with pricing and upload stunning portfolio photos.
HAIRDRESSER_3_TEXT: Receive reservation requests, update capacity, or submit proposals for 'Déplacé' requests.
HAIRDRESSER_4_TEXT: Use your profile to gain subscribers and build a loyal client base.
